colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @027B (CES 'PHAGS PA THUGS RJE CHEN PO ZHAL BCU GCIG PA GRUB DBANG DPAL MO @028A *, ,LUGS KYI SGRUB THABS SMYUNG BAR GNAS PA'I CHO GA BYA TSUL DANG BCAS PA PHAN BDE'I SNANG BA GSAR NGOMS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA HU THOG THU, STAG PHU SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN, CHOS 'KHOR RGYAL MKHAN ZUR SKU SKYE RAB 'BYAMS PA BSKAL BZANG RAB RGYAS, LHA LDAN SPRO BDE KHANG GSAR BA'I DKAR PO PHYOGS BRGYAD PA SPYI TSOGS DANG, 'BRAS SPUNGS SGO MANG AOR DU SU PE'I SE RNAM RGYAL RDO RJE'I SHOG DKA' BCU KLU SGRUB RGYA MTSO, BDE YANGS RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG NOR BU SOGS NAS BSKUL MA RIM PAR BYUNG BAR BRTEN RTZOM 'DUN THOG NYE CHAR KHAL KHA NAS DAD STOBS DANG LDAN PA KHE PA'I AAM PA PE'I SE MCHOG SKYABS KYIS BSKUL MA BYUNG BAR BRTEN, DPAL MGON 'PHAGS PA KLU SGRUB DANG, GRUB BRNYES DPAL MOS MDZAD PA'I RGYA GZHUNG SOGS LA GZHIGS, GTZO CHER PHYAG NA PADMO THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DGE 'DUN RGYA MSOS MDZAD PA'I SGRUB THABS 'JUG PA BDE BAR BRTEN DAR SO CHE BAR 'DUG PAS DE NYID GZHIR BZUNG, MKHAS GRUB TSAD LDAN GZHAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I CHO GA DANG, DAM PA'I PHYAG BZHES SOGS NAS KHA 'GENGS 'OS KYIS LEGS PAR BRGYAN TE, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG CHOS SMRA BA BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS 'PHAGS PA 'JIG RTEN DBANG PHYUG GI PHO BRANG PO TA LA'I GZIM CHUNG NYI 'OD 'KHYIL BAR SBYAR BA'I YE GE PA NI DAR HAN DGE SLONG BSKAL BZANG YON TAN GYIS BGYIS PA'O, ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,)
